grecianfeline: To second Shannon, for anyone out there who's struggling with an emotionally abusive partner right now: write them a letter. Include every detail of exactly how you feel. Don't give it to them, and get out. Listen to what your loved ones have been trying to tell you. And ANY time you think of going back, read it. And read it again. Until you know it by heart. And then, when one day you look back and your heart has healed a little from the pain they caused you, you'll realise what a blessing that letter was. Shannon is proof of that enough. Thank you for sharing these stories, they're so important🙏
